subject: Re: URGENT notice emails not working

full_threads.body: (Time: 15mins)

Hi Luca,

Totally understand your concern — especially with how critical email is for your team.

You’re right that the last issue was related to MX records. It’s possible the DNS records were reset at some point, so I’ve re-added the MX records today to ensure everything is properly configured.

We’ll continue monitoring things closely and keep you updated with any findings. If anything unusual happens again, feel free to shoot through an email.

Hey team

The issue last time was some MX records or something not linked properly on the backend of the website ?

Unsure of this one to be honest - we need this dived in to when the team has a chance as we rely on the emails to work properly, unsure on how the delay has occurred from the last 2 days

Emails are sitting on a 10 min delay at the moment which should be ok but we are worried something has caused this to happen

Warm Regards,

Luca Leonardi

Hi Luka,

We haven’t made any changes on our end, so it’s unclear why the emails haven’t come through yet.

It could be a temporary delay like last time, but keep an eye on it. In the meantime, it might be worth reaching out to any clients who may have emailed you, just in case.

Hi Joel,
Can you confirm when the emails from the last 24 hours will be received?
This error occurred previously when your team was updating the website & all emails that we hadn't received eventually came through but I haven't received any as yet

Thanks

Warm Regards,
Donna Leonardi

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Donna,

It seems to working fine now, but if it occurs again, we can take a deeper look.

hey Joel,

Did you need access to the Google admin console as well?

Get Outlook for iOS

Received at 11:55 am today

Get Outlook for iOS

Hey Joel,

There seems to be quite a delay in receiving the emails.

It still has not been received from Nardi plumbing and the test email was part of this thread not inquiry form.

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Donna,

Were you able to received the email we've sent to you just now? I've sent a test as well using the website contact form.

Hey team

Have attempted to try a test and also have nothing coming through to us

One email has come through as 11:33am today but was supposed to have been received last night 10pm

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Donna,

Thanks for additional information. I've sent a test email using joel@wolfiq.com.au to info@nardiplumbing.com.au
Can you try now?

Hi team,
We use gmail and I have logged in via the browser and the app and still no new emails have come through.

Hi Luca,

We're currently looking into the issue. To assist us in troubleshooting effectively, could you please confirm which email client you're using (e.g. Outlook, Apple Mail, Gmail via browser, etc.)? Additionally, is this issue affecting all mailboxes under your domain or only specific users?

full_threads.body:
Hi Luca,

We're currently looking into the issue. To assist us in troubleshooting effectively, could you please confirm which email client you're using (e.g. Outlook, Apple Mail, Gmail via browser, etc.)? Additionally, is this issue affecting all mailboxes under your domain or only specific users?

Hi team,Hi team,

It's just come to our attention that since Thursday, 29 May 2025 our emails have not been receiving but we are able to send

We've just completed the test this morning and found that we can send emails out but have not been able to receive anything

Is this something that the team can please urgently investigate

As we are waiting on important documents to come through over the weekend, we don't want to miss them

Warm Regards,
Luca Leonardi
